name: svc-vcf-ca
description: Service account for SDDC manager to create CSRs and Signed Certificates.

name: svc-wsa-ad
description: Service Account used for perfroming Active Directory bind operations

name: svc-vsphere-ad
description: Service account for connecting vSphere with Active directory using minimal permissions.

name: svc-vrops-vra
description: Service account for collecting data in vRealize Operations Manager about the workloads in vRealize AutomationUsed for the vRealize Operations with vRealize Automation integration with minimum permissions.

name: svc-vra-vsphere
description: Service account for connecting vRealize Log Insight to vRealize Operations Manager for log forwarding, alerts, and for Launch in Context integration

name: svc-vra-nsx
description: Service account for access from vRealize Automation to NSX Data Center.

name: svc-vra-vcf
description: Service account for connecting vRealize Automation to SDDC Manager

name: svc-vro-vsphere
description: Service account for access from vRealize Orchestrator to vCenter Server

name: svc-vra-vrops
description: Service account for retrieving statistics from vRealize Operations Manager in vRealize Automation for workload reclamation

name: nsx-admin
description: admin account for NSX Manager.  For use with IAM VVS

name: sddc-admin
description: admin account for SDDC Manager.  For use with IAM VVS

name: sddc-ops
description: Operators account for SDDC Manager.  For use with IAM VVS

name: sddc-ro
description: Read Only account for SDDC Manager.  For use with IAM VVS

name: wsa-admin
description: Admin account for WSA Stand Alone Appliance.  For use with IAM VVS

name: vrops-admin
description: Admin account for vROps.  For use with Intelligent Operations VVS

name: vrli-admin
description: Admin account for vROps.  For use with Intelligent Operations VVS

name: kub-admin
description: Admin account for vROps.  For use with Dev Ready VVS
